text: Odell Bradley (born September 6, 1981) is an American professional basketball player. He was a forward in the United States Basketball League and the Continental Basketball Association. ==Early life== Bradley was born September 6, 1981, in Nashville, Tennessee. He played basketball at White Creek High School. ==College== He initially played at Indiana University-Purdue University Indianapolis for the IUPUI Jaguars. While there, he led his team to the NCAA tournament. In his last season there he averaged 23 points per game and 8 rebounds per game. While there, he won the Summit Player of the Year Award. He was an AP Honorable Mention for the AP All American. ==Professional== He was drafted by the United States Basketball League for the Cedar Rapids River Raiders. He later played for the Continental Basketball Association where he led his team on scoring. He also played for the American Basketball Association, where he made the All ABA Championship Finals Team. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Tennessee Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:IUPUI Jaguars men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Odell Bradley
